message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_PROVINCE_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: Province or Territory must be selected for Canadian address

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_STRNUM_STRNAME_FOR_POBOX
message.locale: Street Number and Street name must not be completed for a P.O Box address

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_POBOX_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: P.O. Box must be specified

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_STATE_MUST_BE_BLANK_FOR_CANADIANADDRESS
message.locale: State must not be completed for a Canadian address

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_STATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED_FOR_FOREIGNADDRESS
message.locale: State must be entered for a Foreign address

message.name: ERR_RESIDENTIALADDRESS_POBOX_SHALL_NOT_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: P.O. Box/Rural Route/General Delivery shall not be entered for a residential address

message.name: ERR_PROVINCE_MUST_BE_BLANK_FOR_FOREIGNADDRESS
message.locale: 'Province or Territory' must not be completed for Foreign address

message.name: ERR_STRNUM_STRNAME_MUST_BE_COMPLETED_FOR_CANADIANADDRESS
message.locale: Civic Number and Street name must be completed for Canadian addresses.

message.name: ERR_POSTAL_CODE_FORMAT_FOR_CANADIANADDRESS
message.locale: Postal Code must be in the right format for a Canadian address.

message.name: ERR_POSTAL_CODE_MUST_BE_ENTERED_CANADIANADDRESS
message.locale: Postal Code must be entered

message.name: ERR_ZIP_CODE_MUST_BE_ENTERED_USADDRESS
message.locale: Zip Code must be entered

message.name: ERR_COUNTRY_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Country Code must be selected.

message.name: ERR_STRNUM_STRNAME_OR_POBOX_MUST_BE_COMPLETED_FOR_CANADIANADDRESS
message.locale: Either Civic Number and Street Name, or PO Box/Rural Route/General Delivery must be entered for a Canadian Address.

message.name: ERR_CURRRENT_RESIDENTIAL_END_DATED_ADD_NEW_RESIDENTIAL_ADDRESS
message.locale: Current Residential address is end dated, add a new Residential address.

message.name: ERR_STRNUM_STRNAME_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Street Number and Street name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_STRNUM_STRNAME_OR_POBOX_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Either Street Number and Street Name, or PO Box/Rural Route/General Delivery must be entered.

message.name: INF_NEW_ADDRESS_LABEL
message.locale: Add New Address

message.name: ADDRESS_LINE_APT_STREET_NAME_NUMBER_MUST_BE_LESS_THAN_LIMIT
message.locale: Unit/Apt/Suite Number, Street Name and Street number combined must be less than 40 characters.

message.name: ADDRESS_LINE_POBOX_MUST_BE_LESS_THAN_LIMIT
message.locale: PO Box/Rural Route/General Delivery combined must be less than 40 characters.

message.name: ADDRESS_LINE_CITY_PROVINCE_POSTALCODE_MUST_BE_LESS_THAN_LIMIT
message.locale: City, Town or Village, Province and Postal Code combined must be less than 40 characters.

message.name: ADDRESS_LINE_US_CITY_PROVINCE_POSTALCODE_MUST_BE_LESS_THAN_LIMIT
message.locale: City, Town or Village, State and Zip Code combined must be less than 40 characters.

message.name: ADDRESS_LINE_INTL_STREET_NAME_NUMBER_MUST_BE_LESS_THAN_LIMIT
message.locale: Unit/Apt/Suite Number, Street 1 and Street 2 combined must be less than 40 characters.

message.name: ADDRESS_LINE_INTL_CITY_PROVINCE_POSTALCODE_MUST_BE_LESS_THAN_LIMIT
message.locale: City, Town or Village, State, Province, Region or Territory and Zip Code combined must be less than 40characters.

message.name: ERR_US_ZIP_CODE_MUST_BE_VALID_FORMAT
message.locale: Zip Code must be in the right format for a US Address. For example, 55555 or 55555-5555.

message.name: TO_FROM_DATE_ERR
message.locale: 'From' must be on or before 'To'.

message.name: ERR_INTL_ADDRESS_LINE_ONE_LENGTH_VALIDATION
message.locale: Address Line 1 must be between 1 to 40 characters.

message.name: ERR_INTL_ADDRESS_LINE_TWO_LENGTH_LIMIT
message.locale: Address Line 2 has a maximum of 40 characters.

message.name: ERR_INTL_ADDRESS_LINE_THREE_LENGTH_LIMIT
message.locale: Address Line 3 has a maximum of 40 characters.
